summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an application for a grant and the execution of an agreement with the United States of America, Community Services Administration for financial assistance for the continuation of the "Meals-on-Wheels" food delivery service for the elderly for the period July 1, 1975 to June 30, 1976; authorizing a contract with a food service vendor in connection therewith; increasing a certain Object of Expenditure in the 1975 Budget of the Department of Human Resources in connection therewith; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
